Counter-Strike: Source, a fantastic twitch-based First-person shooter. CS:S is a polished version of it's predecessor (Counter-Strike) where you can play a series of different modes across a huge catalogue of servers from TDM(Team Death-match) to the standard Counter-Terrorist VS Terrorist (FYI, the Terrorist is trying to blow up one of multiple bombsites) This game offers a casual player a chance to have fun with a serious game because of the amusing Surf Maps, Zombie Maps and Gungame maps, while still offering a great competative shooter to Amateur and Professional First-person Shooter's with multiple competition ladders from around the world, set in the world of Counter-Strike Source.

What is Counter Strike (CS) all about well is team-based objective-oriented first-person shooter style gameplay. The aim of playing a map is to accomplish a map's objective: defusing the bomb, rescuing all hostages, or killing the entire opposing team. The ultimate goal of the game is to win more rounds than the opposing team. This game used to be a mod back in 90s is than CS 1.6 come out and now they remake the game with Source engine and thats how this game born.

Is not what you think like other game u hold down the trigger and aim at player easily get lots kill you need know how the gun work how to handle different kind of gun cos they all have different recoil damage and range. while moving dramatically decreases accuracy, and holding the trigger down to continuously shoot produces severe recoil. The severity of damage induced by weaponry is dependent upon the specific locations of hits, with hits to the head being most lethal and shots which make contact elsewhere causing lesser loss of health.

Now 2014 i dont play this game that much anymore,but sometime is nice when i get on the game with AK grad few kill have some fun and trust i have alot memory in this game :)
it's a cassic game and it will be better and better in the future

Counter Strike: Source oder auch kurz CSS ist ein sehr guter Online-Shooter! Es basiert sehr stark auf Taktiken und auf Skill. Dabei wären wir dann auch bei einem Kritikpunkt, denn es ist auf keinen Fall anfängerfreundlich! Sonst ist es aber ein super Spiel, weil man zwischen sehr vielen Server wählen kann, die Modi wie z.B. JailBreak oder BHop anbieten.

Well let's start with some good points:
-Great gameplay. The mechanics are well used with the resources they have here. Granted CG:SO has better ones, purely because that runs on a newer engine.
-ESSENTIAL MATERIAL FILES for Gmod gun addons and the TTT gamemode.
-You cant accidentally change gun like in CS:GO. You actually have to click. This means, however, that you could miss some shots or missclick and shoot a teammate. Not too bad though.
-HUD isn't to cluttered.
-Maps are nice for the engine.
And now the cons:
-Too much CoD playrz/n00bs :(

10/10 Get this game because, seriously, it's an essential. But if you need it for Gmod, don't just buy it and not use it. Play the god damn game. It's the no.2 game collecting dust in player's libraries. Why? Because they think it's bad.

P.S play zombiemod. It's f***ing the best

Counter Strike:Source, How do I begin.

If any of you have played CoD privatly with a few of your best gaming buddies, you know that feeling of fun, you know how cool the atomsphere is?

If you do, well then Counter Strike:Source is for you-but first the aspects of the game:

Graphics-Considering it is early 2000's, the graphics are better than the CoD classics (WaW,MW,MW2.etc), and surprisingly, the graphics aren't that important.

Gameplay-Unlike CoD, which tries to cover up the fact that is IS solely a MP (Multiplayer) game by adding a campaign, CS:S doesn't. Valves, Server system of MP Servers can be a bit frustrating at times (because of the amount of time it takes to log in, but it is made OK, by the overall experience). There is no real objective, apart from killing (unlike CoD, there is no leveling systems, but none is needed) or Modded Servers (Zombie Apolicyle/Infected type thing).

Anything Else-Not really, I reccomend this greatly as, even after a decade, it hasn't died!

Если говорить в полном объеме:
Сounter Strike:source - это онлайновый киберспортивный мультиплеерный шутер с тактическими элементами. Основанный на модификации к Half-Life.Комбинация реалистичного шутера и быстрого аркадного темпа – одни из основных элементов, сделавших игру на столько популярной.Сounter-terrorists (спецназ) сражаются с террористами,вот и вся завязка.Сюжета толком и нет,он и не нужен в тут. Команды спасают или удерживают заложников,обезвреживают или устанавливают бомбу. Используется реальное вооружение.Геймплея походит на "пострелушки" с видом от первого лица. Вместо моментального возрождения игроков после смерти,необходимо дождаться конца раунда. В начале каждого раунда игроки получают деньги для покупки оружия и экипировки.За убиение врагов и выполнение целей даются дополнительные деньги.Такая механика игры,поощряет командную работу.

I LOVE this game.
I have played Counter Strike 1.6 and that game was my childhood.  But when THIS game was released, a Sequel to one of my most beloved games. I was out of this world...
The graphics looked awesome, the implemented physics were really cool (first thing that i was amazed about was that you could shoot barrels and they would fall over).

Even if you don't know how to control the guns and their recoil, even if you don't know what the hell you're suposed to do, even if you are awful at FPS games, with this game and some time You can amaze everyone.

This game, is one of those few games that you will be coming back to, even if it is now a pretty old game. This is the game that you will always remember.

All i can say is, i have played this game for years now (Yes i know i just bought it, before i bought this game i played cracked versions of it FER DAYS),i recommend that all of you who want to buy an awesome game, TRY THIS GAME. You will not be dissapointed.

The Counter Strike Franchise, will always be near my heart.

10/10 
I Truly Recommend This Game To Everybody, Go And Buy It.

There's something to be said for this game, and by extension this entire series. It's a game that's part of the old breed that has survived the decade and has mostly retained its visceral, gunfighter esque, snappy gameplay with an underlying competitve element that forces the player to outthink hos opponent first and outreact themt to a lesser degree. Everyone is a teamplayer, and if you're not, the magic of this game is that it forces you to, for a lack of better words, get good at it, and because of that it propels the user to try and stand toe to toe with veterans and new blood alike on an almost punishingly level ground. Counter Strike Source is by far the most popular varaint of the Counter Strike series, for the good reason that past the core elements of the game from rescuing hostages to defusing (or planting) bombs, there's much more user created content that this game owes its engine too. This game is a must have, because if not for the forever relevent competitive scene, it's for the bhop maps, zombie escapes, jail breaks, mini games, and for the ability to get a game wit hthe Source Engine SDK.

It's not a game that has aethestically kept with time, but its forumla has, and I bet that it will outlive even the juggernauts of the younger Call of Duty and Battlefield titles. This is a game of not reqarding the player with trinkets such as new guns or new faces to wear, but of self satisfaction of beating out an entire enemy team in a clutch move and bringing down the hurt with a well earned AWP. That runs deep, and this game will never make you forget that the only thing seperating you from acing with a Deagle and viewing your team fro ma spectators seat is your own skill.
